  • Constructor Details

    • MinesweeperModel

      public MinesweeperModel(int row, int col, int bomb)
      The constructor for MinesweeperModel.
      Parameters:
      row - The rows requested by the user.
      col - The columns requested by the user.
      bomb - The bomb count requested by the user.

  • Method Details

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      return the board.
      Returns:
      The board of the model.

    • placeBomb

      public void placeBomb(int firstMoveR, int firstMoveC)
      Place the bombs to the board. The number of the bomb placed is depending on the board size. This will automatically increment the neightbor location by 1 when a bomb is placed.
      Parameters:
      firstMoveR - The row the bomb is placed.
      firstMoveC - The column the bomb is placed.

    • mark

      public void mark(int row, int col)
      flag or unflag a location. flag: guess if a location contains a bomb.
      Parameters:
      row - The row the flag will be placed.
      col - The column the flag will be placed.

    • move

      public void move(int row, int col)
      Check if the move contain a bomb or not, it yes, set this.gameover to true. Else, reveal a location. notify the Observer.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the selected move.
      col - The column of the selected move.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      if this.gameover is true and bomb is 0, user win. else user lose.
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • getBombLeft

      public int getBombLeft()
      return the bombs left in the game.
      Returns:
      numbers of bomb left.

    • getStartingVars

      public int[] getStartingVars()
      Returns the starting values of the model.
      Returns:
